ctx: Rdečemorska kriza: nikjer po svetu ni ozkih grl v pristaniščih
content:
From Durban’s shoreline, the immediate horizon of the Indian Ocean
is still decorated with freight vessels on anchorage, waiting for
berthing slots in South Africa’s largest port, a legacy of several
months’ of port congestion. Although it was hoped the backlog could
be cleared by late January, industry experts now say the whole of
February is needed to clear the congestion at the country’s eight
main ports that has seen shipping rates soar and some major lines
pare down port calls.


theloadstar.com/firs...ing-ports/
author: crt

ctx: Rdečemorska kriza: nikjer po svetu ni ozkih grl v pristaniščih
content:
Durban remains the most afflicted port in terms of vessel
congestion, with outdated and insufficient port equipment at the
forefront of the crisis.

Ta congestion ima očitno druge vzroke
author: Korazijan

ctx: Rdečemorska kriza: nikjer po svetu ni ozkih grl v pristaniščih
content:
Zadnja sprememba: crt 24.02.2024 09:43
nenadoma se masa prometa vali tam okoli, ki je prej sla skozi
bab/suez, zdaj pa bi se ustavila za tankanje v juzni afriki.
zmanjka tam, kjer je ze tako svoh podlaga. tako si vsaj jaz kot
ne-pomorec to predstavljam.

Red Sea crisis: surge in number of ships at Durban's port

content:

večja zgostitev. V prvem planu je zanje, kaj se dogaja v Port of
Los Angeles/Long Beach...
